InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: Nav-E7
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Competition

Increased power and performance makes the SNS-R6 stand out from other radars in its class. Get yours today to see why pilots the Empire over love components from Nav-E7 Gadgets.

InstalledItem.Name: LumaCore
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: ACOM
Size: 1
Grade: A
Class: Competition

Among small power plants, ACOM’s LumaCore consistently ranks among the best for its power rate, cool rate, and high overheat temperature. That’s why if you value your ship’s performance over anything else, this competition-grade component is perfect for you.

InstalledItem.Name: Eos
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: RSI 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Eos quantum drive has been a staple in the RSI product line for centuries. Its original design was so perfectly fine-tuned that it has remained basically unchanged since.

Manufacturer: Tarsus
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Journey across the ‘verse with Tarsus’ Explorer jump module, offering greater reliability to help take your wanderlust to new heights.

InstalledItem.Name: QuikCool
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: ACOM
Size: 1
Grade: D
Class: Competition

The QuikCool provides superior performance over other coolers in its class. This competition grade component from ACOM sacrifices stealth and some durability to be one of the most powerful entry-level coolers around.

Behring’s MSD-322 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 3 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of two S2 missiles.
